Reviews.Author: Paula Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: great for the price, I am satisfy with it.  It has all you need if you don't have a lap top, I played a lot of games on it, went away and brought it with me, it was awesome.
Reviews.Title: tablet

Reviews.Author: sibximena
Reviews.Content: i like this tablet very much..is a good product with a very good price...arrives before expected..very well packed ...excellent service ...i hightly recomend this product and this seller ...was a good purchase
Reviews.Title: excellent product and customer service..

Reviews.Author: Carritha Puller
Reviews.Content: It was not a good quality product. It didn't show a good picture or anything and it was slow.  The seller was very good about trying to help assist me with making it work and when it didn't they refunded my money with no problem.
Reviews.Title: Not good quality but great customer service :-)

Reviews.Author: Heather Jessee
Reviews.Content: It got here fast!!!!My kids really like their tablet......I did not know what to expect,but it has been a really great tablet......
Reviews.Title: Nice tablets!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I spent $90 for a tablet and the one we got is very bad. The tablet freezes constantly and runs very slow. The screen is quite low quality and dark. I am very disappointed with the quality of the product. From what I can tell there is not even a way to contact the seller about the issues!!
Reviews.Title: Horrible

Reviews.Author: Stacy Vanover
Reviews.Content: Like the size, but it's built cheaply. Broke the plug in part the second time I plugged it in. Then the ear phone plug broke.
Reviews.Title: Junk

Reviews.Author: Tim Paulsen
Reviews.Content: Kids love them I bought them and they play games and such. They work great and I hope they last.
Reviews.Title: Good product
